name: Form: Shadow
description:
When in shadow form you can access two spells:

(PRIMARY)
"Shroud"
Enter the shadow realm and gain the ability to levitate, while being impervious to the sun.

(SECONDARY)
"Faded Grasp"
Force enemies in a 6 block area into the shadow realm.

badges.text: Hold [USE] to levitate when Shroud is active
